briefTitle: Clinical Validation of an Artificial Intelligence Algorithm to Help Interpret Mammograms
officialTitle: Clinical Validation of an Artificial Intelligence Algorithm to Help Interpret Mammograms
primaryOutcomeMeasure: Evaluate the diagnostic performance (sensitivity, specificity) for operator tumor detection assisted by mammographic diagnostic aid software, and compare it to the diagnostic performance of an unassisted operator.
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Adult woman (40 to 75 years old)
* Treatment at the University Hospitals of Strasbourg between 2010 and 2020 for breast cancer
* including mammography and histological evidence available
* Patient who has already given her consent for the reuse of her anonymous data for research purposes

Exclusion Criteria:

* Woman who expressed her opposition to participating in the study
